Content: I don't understand why everyone has to be so negative. Just express your opinion without being pushy ... I like the new textures_ and if you don't_ that's fine!
I'm not complaining
Command blocks are cool_ though datapacks to me seem a little complicated
Because they don't like Minecraft_ or they want views
hytale is some ripoff if minecraft made by the people who run the server Hypixel
<@411608425257238538> then why are you here?
Okay_ who are you guys talking about_ me?

I would like if they changed the way you start a survival world. Sometimes_ it just feels repetitive. You spawn_ get wood_ hide out during the first night_ and then just mine forever till you get diamonds. THEN you can do stuff. But until that point_ the game feels kind of dull sometimes you know?

I would like if they changed the way you start a survival world. Sometimes_ it just feels repetitive. You spawn_ get wood_ hide out during the first night_ and then just mine forever till you get diamonds. THEN you can do stuff. But until that point_ the game feels kind of dull sometimes you know?
Okay no need to bully me concrete
I'm not saying that MC overall is repetitve_ I'm saying that in survival_ the start is slow
If they changed it up_ maybe had some kind of special event_ IDK_ just SOMETHING
I like the other one better_ but I still find it funny
It would be interesting if at the beginning of a survival world_ you would like_ wake up. It would be interesting to be lying on the ground_ Eyes flutter open_ and your character gets up.
the heck. Danny Devito?

I just feel like the player models need a little more animation I guess. THAT would be interesting. Like the texture wraps for your avatars had an optional space where you could copy the face but with the eyes closed_ and then code it so that every few seconds_ the skin would swap the faces for  split second so it would look like your character blinked or whatever. It sounds KIND of complicated and unneccesary_ but if they added simple things like blinking_ maybe an animation for when your character is idle_ it might make the character appear more alive_ you know.

Right now_ you look at another play and their eyes just STARE at you_ without blinking. And I don't want a mod because one I've never even INSTALLED one_ and I wouldn't want a TON of animations_ just a few simple player animations.

When you have a sequel_ it usually means that the previous game or movie had  a story plot that could be expanded. Minecraft doesn't really HAVE a plot (well_ if you don't think of defeating the ender dragon as the end of the story) so it can't GET a sequel
Well give me an example of a game or movie that doesn't have plot_ but still has a sequel.
The game ain't broken it doesn't need a new engine
